directions.step:
submitted by: hunterd@elmo.nmc.edu (Sandra, Michigan)
Use a round cake pan and line with foil. Butter foil generously. Take ingredients and heat in 10-inch skillet and stir constantly until mixture turns golden brown - about 5 - 6 minutes. Pour and spread in pan. Let cool 15 min. and lift off and break into pieces. Enjoy!! It's that simple!
DAVE <DAVIDG@CLAM.RUTGERS.EDU>
